text: The 2018–19 season was Al-Ettifaq's 74th season in existence and their third consecutive season in the Pro League. Along with the Pro League, the club competed in the King Cup. The season covers the period from 1 July 2018 to 30 June 2019. ==Players== ===Squad information=== ====Out on loan==== ==Transfers== ===In=== ====Summer==== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders
